meta.job_title: Client-Facing Shopify and WordPress Website Developer & Project Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop visually stunning and user-friendly Shopify and WordPress websites that align with clients' brand identities and business objectives.
Gather website requirements, understand client vision, and provide expert recommendations while maintaining clear communication throughout the development process.
Customize themes, templates, and plugins to meet specific client needs and write clean, efficient, and maintainable code to implement custom functionalities and features.
Develop e-commerce websites with Shopify, including product catalogs, shopping carts, secure payment gateways, and inventory management systems.
Ensure websites are optimized for various devices and screen sizes, delivering consistent functionality and aesthetics across desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms.
Implement best practices to optimize website performance, loading speed, and SEO to enhance user experience and search engine rankings.
Conduct thorough testing and debugging of websites to ensure a seamless and error-free user experience, along with providing ongoing maintenance, updates, and technical support.
Collaborate with design teams, content creators, and other developers to ensure cohesive branding and seamless integration of design elements and functionalities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field and/or 3-5 years minimum experience.
